name: ONE WAY DEMO
description:
ONE WAY
The game ONE WAY will tell about the adventures of the main character, who will fight off opponents, solve puzzles, avoid traps and look for the main boss who betrayed the main character in the past.
Key Features:
- Puzzles and traps
- Interesting and energetic gameplay
- Different levels Link to the game on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1803640/ONE_WAY/
